get.description:
Retrieve a list of all AttributeCategory.
- Use 'search' parameter for full-text search across all searchable fields.
- Use 'code', 'id', or 'name' parameters for individual field searches (partial matches).
- Combine 'code', 'id', and 'name' parameters for cross-field AND search.
- sort[any_field]=asc or sort[ant_field]=desc
Example: /?search=keyword&code=abc&name=test&sort[name]=asc&sort[id]=desc

parameters.description: Search term for full-text search across searchable fields
parameters.name: search

post.description: Create an AttributeCategory with the provided JSON payload

get.description: Get a single AttributeCategory by its ID

404.description: Entity '%Entity Type' with ID '%Given ID' not found

put.description: Update the details of an existing AttributeCategory by providing the updated JSON payload

404.description: Entity '%Entity Type' with ID '%Given ID' not found

delete.description: Delete a single Attribute Category by its ID
delete.summary: Delete an Attribute Category by ID

404.description: Entity '%Entity Type' with ID '%Given ID' not found
